text: Allen Daviau, A.S.C. (June 14, 1942 - April 15, 2020) was an American cinematographer. He was known for his works with Steven Spielberg. He worked on E.T. the Extra Terrestrial (1982), The Color Purple (1985), and Empire of the Sun (1987). He was nominated for five Academy Awards. Daviau was born in New Orleans, Louisiana. Daviau died on April 15, 2020 from COVID-19 in Los Angeles, aged 77. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1942 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American cinematographers Category:BAFTA Award winners Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Los Angeles Category:People from New Orleans
title: Allen Daviau
